app.svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 512 512" width="512" height="512">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="512" height="512" fill="#1a1a1a"/>

  <!-- Sacred geometry - outer circle -->
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="179.2" fill="none" stroke="#8b7fff" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.3"/>

  <!-- Eye outline -->
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="256" rx="153.6" ry="92.16" fill="none" stroke="#8b7fff" stroke-width="4"/>

  <!-- Iris gradient -->
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="irisGrad">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#9370DB"/>
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#8b7fff"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#6a5acd"/>
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>

  <!-- Iris -->
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="51.2" fill="url(#irisGrad)"/>

  <!-- Pupil -->
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="25.6" fill="#1a1a1a"/>

  <!-- Highlight -->
  <circle cx="240.64" cy="240.64" r="10.24" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8"/>

  <!-- Sacred geometry points -->
  <circle cx="256" cy="76.8" r="3" fill="#8b7fff" opacity="0.5"/>
  <circle cx="256" cy="435.2" r="3" fill="#8b7fff" opacity="0.5"/>
  <circle cx="76.8" cy="256" r="3" fill="#8b7fff" opacity="0.5"/>
  <circle cx="435.2" cy="256" r="3" fill="#8b7fff" opacity="0.5"/>
</svg>
app.name: Eyes of Azrael App Icon
